title: | Video | These 5 gorgeous brides of Television will take your breath away! | Television Videos | - India Today
text:
Feedback 
From Jennifer Winget to Drashti Dhami, you cannot miss these beautiful brides of television. Beyhadh's Maya looked pretty in all-gold lehenga, while Drashti Dhami made for a beautiful bride in Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil. We couldn't take our eyes off Brahmarakshas' bride Raina, played by Krystle D'Souza. Next Video
